message: Hi Bob, I have a product that I think would be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $13,000. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While I understand your offer, I need to ask for a bit more to make this work for me. How about $11,500?  This is still a great deal for you, considering the value you place on it. Let's see if we can find common ground.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am unable to increase my offer. Would $10,000 be acceptable to you?
